messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph:  Early morning saw DET. Phillips, DET. Gray, and DET. Russell in disguise at the town center. OFFs. Reed, Simmons, and Ross made sure they weren't noticed in the vicinity. SGT. Hill worked closely with DEP. Wells. LT. Watson and CAPT. Webb plotted their next steps. TECH. Ward and CRIMINALIST Adams teamed up on a vital clue. Dr. Mason gave insights on a specific concern.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DET. Phillips Officer Context: In disguise at the town center during early morning. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: DET. Gray Officer Context: Was undercover at the town center. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: DET. Russell Officer Context: Joined the undercover operation at the town center. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: OFF. Reed Officer Context: Made sure they weren't noticed in the vicinity of the town center. Officer Role: Officer Officer Name: OFF. Simmons Officer Context: Maintained a low profile near the town center. Officer Role: Officer Officer Name: OFF. Ross Officer Context: Ensured he wasn't noticed in the vicinity. Officer Role: Officer Officer Name: SGT. Hill Officer Context: Worked closely with DEP. Wells. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: DEP. Wells Officer Context: Collaborated with SGT. Hill. Officer Role: Deputy Officer Name: LT. Watson Officer Context: Plotted next steps alongside CAPT. Webb. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: CAPT. Webb Officer Context: Discussed strategies with LT. Watson. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: TECH. Ward Officer Context: Teamed up with CRIMINALIST Adams on a clue. Officer Role: Technician Officer Name: CRIMINALIST Adams Officer Context: Collaborated on a clue with TECH. Ward. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Dr. Mason Officer Context: Gave insights on a specific concern. Officer Role: Dr. (Expert, though not a direct officer title, inferred from the given titles)
